channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: The White House has unveiled a new “Presidential Walk of Fame” near the Oval Office — but President Joe Biden’s portrait is missing, replaced with an image of an autopen signing his name. #WhiteHouse #USPolitics #Biden #BBCNews

item.title: Nasa has said it hopes to send astronauts on a 10-day trip around the Moon as soon as February - which would be the first crewed lunar mission in 50 years. #Moon #Space #Nasa #BBCNews
item.description: Nasa has said it hopes to send astronauts on a 10-day trip around the Moon as soon as February - which would be the first crewed lunar mission in 50 years. #Moon #Space #Nasa #BBCNews

item.title: Aalborg airport in Denmark was temporarily closed when drones were seen in its airspace. Three other smaller airports in the southern region - Esbjerg, Sønderborg and Skrydstrup - also reported drone activity, but were not closed. #Aalborg #Denmark #Drone
item.description: Aalborg airport in Denmark was temporarily closed when drones were seen in its airspace. Three other smaller airports in the southern region - Esbjerg, Sønderborg and Skrydstrup - also reported drone activity, but were not closed. #Aalborg #Denmark #Drone
